messages.subject: Late talking=late reading?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/25/03 11:06:58 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  But all the experts who say phonics are the key
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/25/03 11:06:58 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< > But all the experts who say phonics are the key to reading are
> missing a piece. My son knows the sound of every single letter, and
> he recognizes by sight every single letter, and he simply doesn't
> read. So much for that theory. >>

This should have been posted at the HEM list recently!! Good point.

Ren
"They dined on mince, and slices of quince, Which they ate with a runcible
spoon;
And hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, they danced by the light of the
moon."
--The Owl and the Pussycat
Edward Lear
